name: The Dancers by The Tulua Project

metadata.name: Dancer 0001
metadata.description: Movement and sound are so unique to our species. A second of harmonious vibrations and infectious rhythms can be the difference between stillness and dancing your heart out. As music producers, we take our job of moving our listener to a different place very seriously. In order to capture our appreciation for music and movement we married infrared hardware with our own art. This collection is a package of our compositions, dances, and color design . Each dancer is a 1/1  loop that is handmade with love and passion to ensure that youâ€™re always grooving.
